sentences.sContent: Can you hang these in the wardrobe, please?
sentences.sCn: 请你把这些衣服挂到衣橱里去好吗？

sentences.sContent: fitted/built-in wardrobes (=wardrobes built against a wall or fitted between two walls)

remMethod.val: ward(保护) ＋ robe(衣服， 长袍) → 保护衣服的地方 → 衣柜

trans.tranOther: a piece of furniture like a large cupboard that you hang clothes in
